  • Method Details

    • startTime

      public static LocalDateTime startTime(LocalDate apptDate, LocalTime apptStart)
      LocalDateTime representing the start time.
      Parameters:
      apptDate - the date selected for the appointment in the Add/Modify Appointment datepickers.
      apptStart - the start time selected for the appointment in the Add/Modify Appointment time combo boxes.
      Returns:
      formatted start time as LocalDateTime object.

    • endTime

      public static LocalDateTime endTime(LocalDate apptDate, LocalTime apptEnd)
      LocalDateTime representing the end time.
      Parameters:
      apptDate - the date selected for the appointment in the Add/Modify Appointment datepickers.
      apptEnd - the end time selected for the appointment in the Add/Modify Appointment time combo boxes.
      Returns:
      formatted end time as LocalDateTime object.

    • setTimeList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<LocalTime> setTimeList(LocalDate date)
      Creates a list of times to be populated in the start and end combo boxes on the Add/Modify Appointment screens. Provides conversion so that the list of times shows only the business's hours of operation, converted to the local time zone of the user.
      Parameters:
      date - the date selected for the appointment in the Add/Modify Appointment datepickers.
      Returns:
      ObservableList timeList containing the LocalTime objects to populate the time list combo boxes.
